page.title: 20Holidays
page.content: We asked forty-nine children from the two junior classes in our school where they were going for their holiday this year. Fourteen were going to the West Country (Cornwall and Devon), 3 to Wales, 2 to Scotland, 8 in the South of England, 12 were going abroad and the other ten were not going away this year. We then asked the children about the countries they have visited abroad sixteen have been to France, 16 to Spain, 2 to Greece, 2 to Belgium, 2 to Ireland, 2 to Africa, 2 to Holland and one each to Austria, Italy and Switzerland. {* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *} The children of Ashington C.E. School (Yellow Class) wrote much of the accompanying material with teachers Mrs Carter and Mr Breach and much help from the Ashington Women's Institute.
